com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.data

Interface AccessibleById

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AccessibleByIndex, Data
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bindable<SelfT>, BoundStatement, GettableById, ReactiveRow, Row, SettableById<SelfT>, UdtValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoundStatementBuilder

    public interface AccessibleById
extends AccessibleByIndex
    A data structure where the values are accessible via a CQL identifier.

    In the driver, these data structures are always accessible by index as well.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int firstIndexOf(CqlIdentifier id)
      Returns the first index where a given identifier appears (depending on the implementation, identifiers may appear multiple times).
      DataType getType(CqlIdentifier id)
      Returns the CQL type of the value for the first occurrence of id.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.data.AccessibleByIndex

        getType, size

      • Methods inherited from interface com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.data.Data

        codecRegistry, protocolVersion

    • Method Detail

      • firstIndexOf

        int firstIndexOf(@NonNull
                 CqlIdentifier id)
        Returns the first index where a given identifier appears (depending on the implementation, identifiers may appear multiple times).
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the id is invalid.

      • getType

        @NonNull
DataType getType(@NonNull
                          CqlIdentifier id)
        Returns the CQL type of the value for the first occurrence of id.

        If you want to avoid the overhead of building a CqlIdentifier, use the variant of this method that takes a string argument.

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the id is invalid.
